data.name: Business Line of Credit
data.description: Flexible and accessible finance for your business, with the ability to draw on funds when you need them most. Enjoy multiple access methods and 24/7 visibility through internet and mobile banking.

features.additionalInfo: Additional secondary cardholders are available where more than one card is required. An initial card on each account, replacements for defective cards and automatic card renewals are free. A fee applies for each additional card ordered at your request.
Track payments with SMS and email alerts.

features.additionalValue: ATM, Internet, Mobile & Phone Banking transactions.
features.additionalInfo: ATM, Internet, Mobile & Phone Banking transactions. No withdrawal fees at Regional Australia Bank ATMs. Transactions at other financial institutions’ ATMs may incur a fee.
This account can be used to send an NPP payment.
Automatic payments can be scheduled to pay your bills and/or split your pay into designated savings accounts.
6 Free Over the Counter (Branch) transactions per month.
Bank 24/7 wherever you are and whenever you want with RAB mobile and internet banking.
Visa Debit Card available to Australian Residents and members aged > 14 years
Make deposits and withdrawals through a Bank@Post facility at Australia Post outlets. For full details refer to our Conditions of Use. Fees and charges apply.
This account can be used as the target of an NPP PayID.
Apple, Samsung and Google Pay can be attached to the product on request.

constraints.additionalInfo: A minimum overdraft amount of $500 applies to this product.

eligibility.additionalInfo: This product is not available to non-business customers.
Product is available to approved borrowers only. Terms, conditions, fees, charges and normal lending criteria apply.
Minimum Deposit of 20% is required for mortgages secured by residential property.
Minimum Deposit of 35% is required for mortgages secured by commercial property.
Minimum Deposit of 40% is required for mortgages secured by rural property.
As a customer-owned bank, customers must also become a shareholder of Regional Australia Bank to be eligible to open an account.

fees.name: Commercial Fees & Charges apply
fees.additionalInfo: Contact our Commercial Lending Team for details

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Contact Regional Australia Bank for details interest rate details. Rates will vary based on the individual circumstances of each borrower.
